title: Pharrel Williams G I R L (Big Papi Ringtones) iPhone+Android
description:
Source: Bubanee's Pharrel Williams G I R L release (www.bubaneemusic2.com)



These are ringtones for Android and iPhone, which means each track is a snippet of the full song. As a smarty pants pointed out, the MP3 Android ringtones will also work for those with Windows-based mobiles.

Thanks to Bubanee for providing source files. Thanks to Bradsta for providing the album cover art.

The Marilyn Monroe ringtone is my favorite....

- Big Papi



For iPhone users import the m4r files into your iTunes ringtone area then sync the phone.

image


For Android users place files in the "ringtone" folder so these don't get mixed up with full songs.

image

Channels.............: Joint Stereo / 44100 hz
